name: Captain America
Abilities: Captain America has agility, strength, speed, endurance, and reaction time superior to any Olympic athlete who ever competed.

name: Iron Man
Abilities: Genius level intellect Proficient scientist and engineer Powered armor suit: Superhuman strength, speed, durability, agility, reflexes.

name: Thor
Abilities: The mighty Thor wields an enchanted Uru hammer, Mjolnir, and is master of thunder and lightning.

name: Hawkeye
Abilities: Master archer and marksman Expert tactician, acrobat and hand-to-hand combatant Using a variety of trick arrows As Goliath

name: Ant Man
Abilities: Ability to shrink to sub-microscopic size and enter the subatomic universes.

name: Black Widow
Abilities: master in the covert arts of espionage, infiltration, and subterfuge

name: Dr. Strange
Abilities: A Master of the Mystic Arts

name: The Hulk
